description.@en: Your Runic enhancements are unstable, and threaten to explode with Ætheric might. Your Runes cannot be inscribed upon living things – unfortunate for those who wished to raise a litter of exploding kittens!

effect.@en: Whenever an object you have inscribed a Rune upon is broken, Ruined! or Wrecked!, it explodes, destroying the object. Those caught in a Burst Template area of effect must succeed at a (Challenging -10%) Coordination Test or suffer 3D10+3 Damage from fire.
